targets.query: SELECT "channel" FROM "uap_radios" WHERE ("device_name" =~ /^$host$/ AND "radio" = 'na') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device_name"

panels.description: PPS on the na band calculated in 30 second buckets.
panels.title: 5 GHz Packets

panels.description: PPS on the ng band calculated in 30 second buckets.
panels.title: 2.4GHz Packets

list.label: UniFi AP:
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values from "uap" with key="name"
